import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import ProductCard from './ProductCard' import { Api } from '../API/Api' import { endPoints } from '../API/Endpoint' const TrendSlider = ({ data }) => { const [TrendSliderdata, SetTrendSliderdata] = useState() useEffect = ()=>{ const responsepayload = { block_name: data.block_name, id: data.id } Api.post(endPoints.GET_HOME_PAGE_DATA, responsepayload).then((res) => SetTrendSliderdata(res.data.data)) .catch((err) => console.log(err))},[data] console.log return (<>

Trend Alerts

View All
) } export default TrendSlider
